SELECT
FROM COMPLAINT_INFO a
AND a.case_number LIKE '%'||#{caseNumber}||'%' '%'+#{caseNumber}+'%' concat('%',#{caseNumber},'%')
AND a.visitor_name LIKE '%'||#{visitorName}||'%' '%'+#{visitorName}+'%' concat('%',#{visitorName},'%')
AND a.visitor_mobile LIKE '%'||#{visitorMobile}||'%' '%'+#{visitorMobile}+'%' concat('%',#{visitorMobile},'%')
AND a.patient_name LIKE '%'||#{patientName}||'%' '%'+#{patientName}+'%' concat('%',#{patientName},'%')
AND o1.id LIKE '%'||#{involveHospital}||'%' '%'+#{involveHospital}+'%' concat('%',#{involveHospital},'%')
AND o2.id LIKE '%'||#{involveDepartment}||'%' '%'+#{involveDepartment}+'%' concat('%',#{involveDepartment},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
